user_fid = #{userFid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT},

last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update t_attendance_sheet set fid = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_fid = #{userFid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_vacte = #{isVacte,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_attendance_sheet
fid = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_fid = #{userFid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_vacte = #{isVacte,jdbcType=TINYINT},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where start_time >= #{start} and start_time <= #{end}
